title.zh: 《建元已來王子侯者年表》 Yearly Table of the Nobles' Sons who became Marquises since the Jianyuan period
title.raw: 《建元已來王子侯者年表》 Yearly Table of the Nobles' Sons who became Marquises since the Jianyuan period

sentences.zh: 制詔御史：「諸侯王或欲推私恩分子弟邑者，令各條上，朕且臨定其號名。
太史公曰：盛哉，天子之德！
